details.description:
Available for Immediate Move-In
Welcome to the Penthouse Residence at 431 Columbia Street ? a beautifully crafted three-bedroom, two-bathroom floor-through home that blends modern sophistication with everyday comfort in the heart of Red Hook, Brooklyn.
Be the first to live in this thoughtfully designed space, featuring a private terrace? a rare city retreat offering both open-air tranquility and elevated views.
Inside, every detail has been considered for comfort and convenience. Enjoy Mitsubishi Electric split-system climate control in all bedrooms and the living area, hardwood flooring, modern lighting, ample closet space, and an in-unit LG washer and dryer.
At the heart of the home, the open-concept chef?s kitchen features a full suite of KitchenAid stainless steel appliances, including an electric range, refrigerator, dishwasher, and vented microwave. Rich wood cabinetry, elegant countertops, and a chevron-tiled backsplash complete the modern design with timeless style.
The shared full bathroom, located off the main living area, showcases sleek chrome and brushed metal finishes. The primary suite includes an en-suite bath with a calming, spa-inspired palette and its own temperature control for personalized comfort.
Just steps from Van Brunt Street?s vibrant shops, caf?s, and acclaimed restaurants, this home places you at the center of Red Hook?s creative energy and tight-knit community.

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)

details.description:
----- Luxury STUDIO, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

Literally just a stroll from the tranquil beauty of Prospect Park and the B/Q trains for easy commute into Manhattan. Call me today and we can arrange a viewing!

Check out this stunning, newly renovated duplex featuring 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms, and an expansive open basement. The space boasts hardwood floors, on-site laundry, and access to a shared backyard. Conveniently located near a variety of restaurants, bars, shops, and grocery stores, and just a short distance from the Morgan Ave and Jefferson St L train stops!

amenities.other: Shared Outdoor Space

details.description:
Extra large corner unit 1 bedroom apartment brimming with charm in a prime location. Hardwood floors, oversized windows, and original exposed brick throughout offer an inspiring living space for all of your needs! The kitchen is clean with nicely finished white appliances and cabinets, and the bedroom is *king-size* with multiple windows. Great storage throughout the apartment includes two closets. Full bathroom with a tub is the cherry on top!
You'll love the incredible location on one of the most desirable BK Heights blocks. Grab a beverage at the popular Vineapple Cafe right downstairs, and then you're just steps away from Cadman Plaza Park, the Brooklyn Bridge Park+Roller Rink, and everything else in Downtown Brooklyn. Manhattan is just minutes away, with super easy via the 2, 3, and A trains, as well as the Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridges. Message me to view today!

New Crown Heights building! Everything has been gut renovated. Beautiful new flooring, light fixtures, tiling and more. 6 units available in this building, but they are priced to move quickly so don?t wait for long!
Laundry in building Central Air Brand new appliances Brand new shower
Located at 119 Albany Brooklyn NY
Units is conveniently located near 2 train lines: -3 blocks away from the Kingston-Throop on the c line. -8 blocks away from the Nostrand avenue on the 3 line

3br/1.5 bath Duplex!
Modern meets classic with style in this fabulous Crown Heights brownstone! This apartment has all the timeless details you want, like exposed brick and picture windows, together with all modern fixtures and finishes. The sleek black, white and stainless steel kitchen is spacious and includes a microwave. There's laundry in the unit and it's a pet friendly building. Located on a lovely tree lined street less than a block from all the great dining and shopping on Nostrand Ave and a short walk to the park and library. The Nostrand/Fulton A,C is close by to make commuting quick and easy.

amenities.other: Washer/Dryer In Unit, Roof Access

details.description:
With Atlantic Ave and Eastern Parkways to the north/south AND Utica and Franklin to the east/west, you couldn?t ask for a better location that this! Enjoy the old school vibe meets new school renovation and bustle of the historical Crown Heights neighborhood in this beautiful building! With BRAND NEW renovations, this has all the things Brooklynites love about both charm and luxury.
Conveniently located off the LIRR, 2, 3, 4, A, and C trains, as well as the B14, B15, B45, B46, and B65 bus routes.
FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C; Heat Shared Laundry Room Pet Friendly First; Security NO FEE!

details.description:
Bright and spacious in Ditmas Park!
This superbly renovated two bedroom has a huge common area with gleaming maple hardwood floors. The fully stocked corner kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, glass tile back splash and dark wood cabinets. The queen sized bedrooms are bright and sunny with tons of closet space! The updated bath is streamlined with modern fixtures and classic grey tile. There is a washer/dryer in the apartment and heat and hot water are included, saving you time and money. There's a video intercom for added peace of mind. Groceries, pharmacies, bars and restaurants are just steps away. Located around the corner from the 2.5 or B.Q subway lines for a quick and easy commute.

details.description:
Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.

Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.

Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

details.description:
Prime Clinton Hill | 2 Bed / 2 Bath with Oversized Private Terrace
Experience modern living in this brand-new, full building gut renovation finished to the highest standards. This spacious home boasts soaring ceilings, sleek custom finishes, and top-tier sound insulation for comfort and quiet.
The open kitchen is designed for both style and function, with granite countertops, abundant storage, and a full suite of stainless-steel appliances including a dishwasher. A washer/dryer is conveniently in-unit.
The highlight of the apartment is the expansive private terrace, perfect for entertaining or relaxing outdoors.
Located in the heart of Clinton Hill, just blocks from Fort Greene Park and Pratt Institute, with neighborhood favorites like Choice Market, Speedy Romeo, and Bar Bolinas at your doorstep. Shopping, dining, and essentials line nearby Myrtle and Fulton.
Transit is seamless with the C train at Clinton?Washington, the G train at Classon Ave, plus easy bus access (B38, B52, B69).
Available now.
